Project co-ordinated by Nick Reeve and Jo Brooks.

"Why Upload Two Copies Of The Same Album ?"


For fans, collectors and audiophiles alike to compare and enjoy the quality differences between the original 1980's release
and the 2003 digitally remastered version.

Whatever version you prefer "Arena" is an excellent live album and represents the first of many career peaks the band have experienced throughout the last thirty years.
